page.shortlink: api sql namespace statement object parse function
page.description: Parse the SQLStatement passed (or the value previously set into the SQLStatement property).
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = Parse([SQLStatement as C])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

page.discussion: The .Parse() method parses the SQL_Statement string (or the value previously set into the SQL::Statement.SQLStatement property).
page.example: dim stat as SQL::Statement dim sql_query as C sql_query = "SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE len(lastname) > 6" ? stat.parse(sql_query) = .T.
